channel.title: I need good coders to help me recreate runescape back in 06!
channel.description:
ok so i need a coder. what I will be doing is i will make the website and host the server till we have enough money for a dps and my website will be custom made from html so it will take a good amount of time im still thinking of a server source and client
but my goals with this server is to re create runescape in 06 without korasi ags dclaws and spirit shields and pvp armor all those will be removed unless the players want it to be added in while im waiting for a coder i will be trying my best to learn as much coding as i possibly can.
home to lumbridge all those old school runescape quests no turmoil and stuff remove rune and helm of neitiznots and whips and stuff from shops and make it so you have to earn those items and i plan to open up a beta testing then release it when it is ready
more to be added to this
also pm me your email and say that you would like to be in the beta testing but there wont be beta testing for a while so yeah
Pictures: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2d7hfmh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1381405/magebook.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1381408/firemaking.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/351e25s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1381413/hi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1381416/Mining.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1381417/Prayer.png[/img]
Thanks!
pm me your email if your interested.

75% of the people here couldn’t even get hyperion running =
[/quote]
uh excuse me i can compile and run but can’t make myself owner…[/quote]

where did you find the ip i honestly cant find it…
